ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-01-25
          -the committee deferred deliberation on subject measure pending submission of position paper by the DPWH
      2. Measure approved by the Committee on 2017-03-08
          -the committee agreed to approve subject measure on condition that DPWH shall resolve the problem on twelve plantilla positions that will be affected by said abolition
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON NORTH LUZON GROWTH QUADRANGLE ON 2016-12-07
